About Us
PHOENIX THEATRES ENTERTAINMENT
SERVICES INCLUDE:
-Full Theatre Management Services Operations Concessions, Marketing and Accounting
-Film Booking and Settlement
-New Construction and Retrofit Consulting
Phoenix Theatres Entertainment, LLC based in Knoxville, Tennessee is currently among the largest theatre circuits in the United States. Managing theatres coast to coast, our focus is generating profits for owners of an individual theatre to groups of theatres. We focus on operations, marketing and film booking. Our objectives encompass two primary areas:
1. The management and operation of theatre owned by third parties
2. The acquisition of theatre assets considered “non-strategic” to the major chains
Phoenix Theatres Entertainment arranges licensing and settlement of film engagements with film distribution. Our experienced team of film professionals has over 70 years in the industry. They have contacts with all studios of Hollywood and foreign studios.
Why Choose Phoenix Theatres Management?
With a combined 200 years of Motion Picture Exhibition experience, the key management of Phoenix Theatres is well established in the industry. We have relationships with all of the major studios, vendors, media and trade organizations in the business. Phoenix Theatres Entertainment possess the knowledge and expertise of a major circuit, with the laser like focus of an independent. Active members of the National Association of Theater Owners, the National Association of Concessionaires and the International Council of Shopping Centers. Phoenix Theatres has devoted extensive efforts to make theatre uses better understood, and hopefully more of an integral part of shopping center development and operation. These attributes, combined with extensive industry knowledge and experience, allow Phoenix Theatres to maximize theatre revenues and produce superlative operating results.
Call Phoenix Theatres Entertainment today at (865) 692-4061.
With regard to management, if your shopping center is losing the operator of your cinema and you wish to maintain an operating theatre we can seamlessly take over its operations. Providing an analyst of your options and potential revenue, we can take control of your site within a few weeks. Don’t let your theatre go dark, let Phoenix Theatres Entertainment manage your theatre property.
